mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ER_STORAGE ( ER_STORAGE_KEY, ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY, ER_STORAGE_NAME, ER_STORAGE_TERM, ER_STORAGE_MANAGER, ER_STORAGE_ORDERBY )VALUES( SEQ_ER_STORAGE_KEY.NEXTVAL, #{storageFolderKey}, #{storageName}, #{storageTerm}, #{storageManager}, #{storageOrderBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ER_STORAGE_FOLDER ORDER BY ER_FOLDER_GROUP DESC, ER_FOLDER_LEVEL ASC, er_folder_orderby asc

SELECT es.ER_STORAGE_KEY, es.ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY, es.ER_STORAGE_NAME, es.ER_STORAGE_TERM, es.ER_STORAGE_MANAGER, es.ER_STORAGE_ORDERBY, esf.ER_FOLDER_KEY, esf.ER_FOLDER_NAME, esf.ER_FOLDER_GROUP, esf.ER_FOLDER_LEVEL, esf.ER_FOLDER_USE_YN, m.MEMBER_KEY, m.DEPARTMENT_KEY, m.JOB_KEY, m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_PW, m.MEMBER_PHONE, m.MEMBER_EMAIL, m.MEMBER_MESSAGE, m.MEMBER_ENROLL_DATE, m.MEMBER_LEAVE_DATE, m.MEMBER_TELL, m.MEMBER_ADDRESS, m.ACCESS_KEY, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.MEMBER_GENDER, m.MEMBER_STATE, m.MEMBER_BIRTHDATE, m.MEMBER_PROFILE_IMAGE, j.JOB_NAME, d.DEPARTMENT_NAME FROM ER_STORAGE es LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON es.ER_STORAGE_MANAGER = m.MEMBER_KEY LEFT JOIN ER_STORAGE_FOLDER esf ON esf.er_folder_key = es.ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY LEFT JOIN DEPARTMENT d ON m.DEPARTMENT_KEY = d.DEPARTMENT_KEY LEFT JOIN job j ON j.JOB_KEY = m.JOB_KEY WHERE es.ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY=#{folderKey}
SELECT ER_FOLDER_KEY, ER_FOLDER_NAME, ER_FOLDER_GROUP, ER_FOLDER_LEVEL, ER_FOLDER_USE_YN, ER_FOLDER_ORDERBY FROM ER_STORAGE_FOLDER WHERE ER_FOLDER_KEY = #{folderKey}
SELECT ER_STORAGE_KEY, ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY, ER_STORAGE_NAME, ER_STORAGE_TERM, ER_STORAGE_MANAGER, ER_STORAGE_ORDERBY FROM ER_STORAGE WHERE ER_STORAGE_KEY = #{storageKey}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ER_STORAGE_FOLDER WHERE ER_FOLDER_LEVEL=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ER_STORAGE_FOLDER( ER_FOLDER_KEY, ER_FOLDER_NAME, ER_FOLDER_GROUP, ER_FOLDER_LEVEL, ER_FOLDER_USE_YN, ER_FOLDER_ORDERBY )VALUES( SEQ_ER_STORAGE_FOLDER_KEY.NEXTVAL, #{folderName}, #{folderGroup}, #{folderLevel}, #{useYn}, #{folderOrderBy} )
mapper.select: SELECT ER_FOLDER_NAME FROM ER_STORAGE_FOLDER WHERE ER_FOLDER_GROUP = #{folderGroup} AND ER_FOLDER_LEVEL = 1
